dcterms:creator: Vassil Panayotov
Guoguo Chen
Daniel Povey
Sanjeev Khudanpur
dcterms:description: A clean 360-hour subset of LibriSpeech was used to learn speech representations, utilizing an 80-dimensional log Mel spectrogram as the surface feature.
dcterms:title: LibriSpeech

dcterms:creator: Douglas Paul
Janet Baker
dcterms:description: The representations learned from LibriSpeech were evaluated on the Wall Street Journal corpus for tasks such as phone and speaker classification.
dcterms:title: Wall Street Journal corpus (WSJ)
